description: Lists all the available batch job definitions based on the batch job resources uploaded during the application creation. You can use the batch job definitions in the list to start a batch job.

nested_items.name: batchJobDefinitions
nested_items.description: The list of batch job definitions.

nested_items.name: fileBatchJobDefinition
nested_items.description: Specifies a file containing a batch job definition.

nested_items.name: fileName
nested_items.description: The name of the file containing the batch job definition.

nested_items.name: folderPath
nested_items.description: The path to the file containing the batch job definition.

nested_items.name: scriptBatchJobDefinition
nested_items.description: A script containing a batch job definition.

nested_items.name: scriptName
nested_items.description: The name of the script containing the batch job definition.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more items to return, this contains a token that is passed to a subsequent call to this operation to retrieve the next set of items.
